entry.name: fold
entry.title: Fold Effect
entry.desc: The fold effect hides or shows an element by folding it.

dl.dd: Will use hide or show depending on the current visibility of the element

option.name: size
option.desc: The size of the "folded" element, can be a number representing px, or a string containing a percentage I.E. "50%"

option.name: horizFirst
option.desc: If the horizontal direction happens first when hiding. Remember, showing inverts hiding.

example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the silver box.
